001package com.deploygate.sdk;
002
003import com.deploygate.sdk.internal.Logger;
004import com.deploygate.sdk.internal.annotations.Experimental;
005
006@Experimental
007public class CustomLogConfiguration {
008    @Experimental
009    public enum Backpressure {
010        /**
011         * SDK rejects new logs if buffer size is exceeded
012         */
013        PRESERVE_BUFFER,
014
015        /**
016         * SDK drops logs from the oldest if buffer size is exceeded
017         */
018        DROP_BUFFER_BY_OLDEST
019    }
020
021    /**
022     * the log buffer is required until DeployGate client app receives BOOT_COMPLETED broadcast.
023     * <p>
024     * This is an experimental value.
025     * <p>
026     * - 10 seconds until boot-completed
027     * - 10 logs per 1 seconds
028     * - plus some buffer
029     */
030    private static final int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE = 150;
031    private static final int MAX_BUFFER_SIZE = DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
032
033    public final Backpressure backpressure;
034    public final int bufferSize;
035
036    /**
037     * Do not bypass {@link Builder} to instantiate this class.
038     *
039     * @see Builder
040     */
041    private CustomLogConfiguration(
042            Backpressure backpressure,
043            int bufferSize
044    ) {
045        this.backpressure = backpressure;
046        this.bufferSize = bufferSize;
047    }
048
049    @Experimental
050    public static class Builder {
051        private Backpressure backpressure = Backpressure.DROP_BUFFER_BY_OLDEST;
052        private int bufferSize = DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
053
054        /**
055         * @param backpressure
056         *         the strategy of the backpressure in the log buffer
057         *
058         * @return self
059         *
060         * @see Backpressure
061         */
062        public Builder setBackpressure(Backpressure backpressure) {
063            if (backpressure == null) {
064                throw new IllegalArgumentException("backpressure must be non-null");
065            }
066
067            this.backpressure = backpressure;
068            return this;
069        }
070
071        /**
072         * @param bufferSize
073         *         the max size of the log buffer
074         *
075         * @return self
076         */
077        public Builder setBufferSize(int bufferSize) {
078            if (bufferSize <= 0) {
079                throw new IllegalArgumentException("buffer size must be greater than 0");
080            }
081
082            if (bufferSize > MAX_BUFFER_SIZE) {
083                Logger.w("buffer size is exceeded %d so it's rounded to %d", bufferSize, MAX_BUFFER_SIZE);
084                bufferSize = MAX_BUFFER_SIZE;
085            }
086
087            this.bufferSize = bufferSize;
088            return this;
089        }
090
091        public CustomLogConfiguration build() {
092            return new CustomLogConfiguration(backpressure, bufferSize);
093        }
094    }
095}
